ai-ud4.10:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-ud4.10:1.3_0: Now at that time Venerable Sāriputta was sitting not far from the Buddha cross-legged, with his body straight, reviewing his own peacefulness.
ai-ud4.10:2.1_0: The Buddha saw him meditating there.
ai-ud4.10:3.1_0: Then, knowing the significance of this, on that occasion the Buddha expressed this heartfelt sentiment:
ai-ud4.10:4.1_0: “With mind at peace, so full of peace,
